word_mean: 交易所中证券或商品价格降后复升

sentence.Network_en: The Treasury has long been predicting an upturn in consumer spending.
sentence.Network_cn: 财政部早就预测消费者支出会出现上扬。

sentence.Network_en: There has been a modest upturn in most parts of the industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 该行业的绝大部分领域都出现了一定程度的好转。

entry.def: If there is an upturn in the economy or in a company or industry, it improves or becomes more successful.

example.ex: They do not expect an upturn in the economy until the end of the year...
example.tran: 他们预测要到年底经济才能有所好转。

example.ex: There has been a modest upturn in most parts of the industry.
example.tran: 该行业的绝大部分领域都出现了一定程度的好转。

means.word_mean: 1. an upward movement or trend as in business activity

auth_sentence.content: The upturn in Beijing could lift the world economy.
auth_sentence.res_content: The upturn in Beijing could lift the world economy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The upturn in Beijing could lift the world economy.

auth_sentence.content: An upturn in bookings for local tours.
auth_sentence.res_content: An upturn in bookings for local tours.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An upturn in bookings for local tours.

auth_sentence.content: An imminent upturn in the economy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An imminent upturn in the economy.

stems_affixes.word_buile: up向上+front前面→在前面,在上面
up向上+front前面→在前面,在上面

stems_affixes.value_cn: 侯补,备用物,后备人员,支援者
stems_affixes.word_buile: back背后+up向上→在背后向上推→支持
up向上+heav=heave举起+al状态,性质→n.动乱,大变动

stems_affixes.value_cn: 机构,设置,装备,组织,计划,调整
stems_affixes.word_buile: set安置+up向上→词组set up合写
up向上+braid辫子→向上抓辫子→责骂
up向上+hold拿住→向上拿住→支持

sentences.en: The economy is experiencing an upturn.
Experts have forecast an upturn in the stock market.
sentences.cn: 专家已预测股票市场价格有上升趋势。
风暴把镇子搅得天翻地覆。
